entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:10 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 10:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -29.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
